document.full_text: daisy eagan, who became the youngest girl ever to win a tony in 1991, is dipping a toe back into theatrical waters with a cabaret show called 'still daisy after all these years.'
document.title: a former child star returns, with wisdom
lines_and_colors: daisy eagan, who became the youngest girl ever to win a tony in 1991, is dipping a toe back into theatrical waters with a cabaret show called 'still daisy after all these years.'
